title: Another year another moment
excerpt: New Years is a vastly overrated holiday. Because, of course, the 'first of the year' is mostly made-up.

children.text: New Years is a vastly overrated holiday. Because, of course, the 'first of the year' is mostly made-up.
If you really want to change, or try something new, today's not the only day to do it.
But if it today makes you feel that you've somehow been given a fresh start, it most certainly is a good enough reason to do so.
